args.name: x
args.desc: The x position to draw the sprite batch.

args.name: y
args.desc: The y position to draw the sprite batch.

args.name: r
args.desc: The rotation to draw the sprite batch with.

args.name: sx
args.desc: The x scale to draw the sprite batch with.

args.name: sy
args.desc: The y sacle to draw the sprite batch with.

args.name: quad
args.desc: The quad to draw the sprite batch with.

note: The function returns the spritebatch object itself, so it can be used for chain calls.
